declarations.description: A custom HTML element for displaying breadcrumb navigation.
declarations.name: U2Breadcrumb

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: Automatically generate breadcrumb items based on the current URL path.

cssProperties.name: --u2-breadcrumb-separator
cssProperties.description: The separator character between breadcrumb items.

cssProperties.name: --u2-breadcrumb-separator-margin-inline
cssProperties.description: The horizontal margin around the separator.
